travel_abyss_to_frost_world.title: Travel to The Frost World
travel_abyss_to_frost_world.description: The Frost World Portal is found inside The Abyss, however it could be anywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! You made it to the last realm. There is nothing here but means to fight! Take care!

100enemies_frost_world.title: Slay 100 Enemies in The Frost World
100enemies_frost_world.description: This new place is much more harsh. New possibilities, new enemies. Get acquainted.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! There is no effort without a worth reward
